direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve creating a new instance of the Element class, but clone() also clones child nodes.
doClone() is a helper method used by clone() to perform the cloning operation, indicating a strong structural relationship.
Both methods modify the state of the Element by either cloning or clearing its child nodes.
Both methods involve manipulating the child nodes of the Element, indicating a similarity in resource access.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require ensuring that child nodes are properly initialized before performing operations.
Both methods involve changes to the node list, which requires updating the shadow child elements.
Both methods involve accessing and manipulating the list of child elements, indicating a similarity in post-operation assertions.
